name: All In Your Head
description:
Are you awake? Or are you asleep? Conscious or sub-conscious? Or is it just all in your head? A platformer adventure like no other, All In Your Head will bring you through states of consciousness and sub-consciousness to complete challenging levels. Or maybe you're the creative type. Well that's okay, because All In Your Head comes fully equipped with a level editor for all your creative needs (located in the Level Select).

Originally created in August 2014 for Ludum Dare 30. Developed in 48 hours by Justin Nauta, based on the Theme "Connected Worlds". Re-Uploaded to this website, but left unchanged for posterity purposes.
